description: Identifier of the user linked to this domain membership; foreign key to the user master/account record.
Identifier of the organizational or tenant domain the user can access within the fleet platform; likely the company/site context; confirm with SME.
Identifier of the permission role assigned to the user for this domain; references the roles catalogue used for access control.
